newsitem.title: USA: KN Energy offers clients Internet, TV links.
newsitem.headline: KN Energy offers clients Internet, TV links.

text.p: Colorado natural gas company KN Energy Inc. said Monday it would offer its customers a bundle of information and communication services, such as satellite television and Internet access to its mainly-rural customer base, in addition to supplying gas.
The company said in a statement it would provide satellite television access, long-distance telephone billing options and Internet access to its mainly-rural customer base.
It would also set up toll-free phone numbers for customers to order spare electric parts, summon electricians and talk to technicians about -- all to be paid for in one monthy bill.
KN Energy said it hoped to sell the services to other regional utility companies.
